sense.name: Look around casually, as during reading or shopping.
sense.commentary: Includes: BROWSE FOR Syntax Includes: NP1[agent[human]] BROWSE NP2[patient]] NP1[agent[human]] BROWSE for NP2[patient]
sense.examples: I'm browsing for information online. I don't need any help. I'm just browsing. Browse the computer directory for suspicious files.

sense.name: Eat or feed lightly, trying different dishes or working over a meadow or pasture.
sense.commentary: Note: Applies to both humans and animals. Includes: BROWSE FOR
sense.examples: The herd was browsing in the field. There was so much food at the party that we quickly got sated just by browsing. We browsed the buffet.
